SqlText: select [OITM].[ItemCode],[OITM].[ItemName],[OITM].[ManSerNum] as [ManageSerialNumbers],[OITM].[ManBtchNum] as [ManageBatchNumbers],[OITM].[CodeBars] as [BarCode],[OIBQ].[OnHandQty] as [Quantity] from [OIBQ],[OBIN],[OITM] where [OIBQ].[ItemCode] = [OITM].[ItemCode] and [OIBQ].[BinAbs] = [OBIN].[AbsEntry] and ([OBIN].[BinCode] = :binLocation or [OBIN].[BarCode] = :binLocation)
